* [City Secretary](https://www.alton-tx.gov/departments/city_secretary/index.php)



The City of Alton understands and supports the public’s right to access the public records created and maintained by the City in the course of their normal business. It is the goal of the City to provide service in a transparent manner, which includes timely access to requested records under the Public Information Act (PIA).

The only legal requirement to submit a request is that it be in writing. Please fill out the
[Public Information Request Form](https://www.alton-tx.gov/uploadfiles/Public%20Information%20Request%202023.pdf)
or send an email. Make sure you state the record(s) you are needing; please be very specific on the information you are requesting.

* The City of Alton is not required to answer questions, perform legal research or comply with a continuing request to supply information periodically that has information in the future.
* We recommend that all requests be sent by U.S. mail, by fax, by email, or in person.
* We recommend that all requests be addressed to the
  [City Secretary](https://alton-tx.gov/departments/#1546954217069-a11ed7d3-af1e)
  . Requests made by facsimile or electronic mail must be addressed to the City Secretary to trigger an obligation under the Public Information Act.

Be advised that there may be a charge for the requested information.

**TO REQUEST INFORMATION FROM THIS GOVERNMENTAL BODY, PLEASE CONTACT:**

* Janie Flores, City Secretary, 509 S Alton Blvd. Alton, Texas 78573
* [janie.flores@alton-tx.gov](mailto:janie.flores@alton-tx.gov)
* (956) 432-0766
* Alton City Hall, 509 S Alton Blvd. Alton, Texas 78573
